relationships.description: Harry wants to hear from Dumbledore, who has finished eating and is about to announce the champions.
Karkaroff and Maxime look tense and expectant, just like everyone else in the Hall.
Bagman is beaming and winking at various students.
Crouch looks uninterested in Dumbledore's announcement.
The goblet is ready to make its decision, which will be announced by Dumbledore.
